Name: Bakery Shop Simulator
About the game: Run Your Own Bakery Shop . Manage Economics , keep and eye on your resources while baking 25 types of bread and cakes , and be the cashier in a bakery shop on the main street FEATURES : - 13 Kitchen Equipment To Buy - 3 Furniture To Buy - 3 Self Serve Machines to Buy - 23 Ingredients To Buy - Computer To Manage Your Shop - Packing Machine To Package Your Products - Barcode Scanner That Can Be Used By The Player To Sell Customers - TV That you can use to play any video on the internet inside the game - Worker - Npc Customers Actually walk into your shop - NPC citizens walking and cars in the streets - Day/ Night System - Economy Management - Close / Open Shop Function To Help The Player Manage The Shop Without Having To Sell Customers
